description:
In Viviter's multiplayer mode, where you can play "Chickempic" with up to 8 players, we're adding the "Death Proposal" mini-game!
I love you. How can I make you believe in this feeling?
Hmm? A cat, a truck... Ah! I've got it!
Watch this! In the face of my love, even that truck will stop!
Can you believe that I offer you an eternal love, undisturbed by trucks?
name: Additional mini-game "Death Proposal"
